pages.text: $(n)The simplest infinite water source:$() $(br)$(li)$(n)Step 1:$() Dig a hole 1 block down, 2 blocks wide and 2 blocks long. $(br)$(li)$(n)Step 2:$() Fill in 2 opposite corners with $(item)Water$() source blocks. $(br)$(li)$(n)Step 3:$() Get a $(item)Bucket$() and take all the $(item)Water$() you want!
